name: Pocket Boy 2018 with Ads
description:
A simple and fun game to play when your on a train, bus, a passenger in a car etc...

Designed to be played with one hand.

Pocket Boy is a side-scrolling game featuring 2D retro style pixelated graphics. The objective of the game is to ride along a very long road and collect as many coins in your pocket as you can to fill your piggy bank, just watch out for traffic cones as these will cause damage to your bicycle front wheel.

Too much damage and the game will be over, they are also puddles to avoid as well as ice patches that don't damage your bike but will for a short time prevent you to move up or down or lose control of your bike.



Have fun....
